entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 1.
